<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This file implements support for context disambiguation of allocation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// calls for profile guided heap optimization. Specifically, it uses Memprof</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// profiles which indicate context specific allocation behavior (currently</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// distinguishing cold vs hot memory allocations). Cloning is performed to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// expose the cold allocation call contexts, and the allocation calls are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// subsequently annotated with an attribute for later transformation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The transformations can be performed either directly on IR (regular LTO), or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on a ThinLTO index (and later applied to the IR during the ThinLTO backend).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Both types of LTO operate on a the same base graph representation, which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// uses CRTP to support either IR or Index formats.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3630"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This method assigns cloned callsites to functions, cloning the functions as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3631"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// needed. The assignment is greedy and proceeds roughly as follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3632"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3633"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each function Func:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3634"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   For each call with graph Node having clones:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3635"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     Initialize ClonesWorklist to Node and its clones</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3636"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     Initialize NodeCloneCount to 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3637"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     While ClonesWorklist is not empty:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3638"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        Clone = pop front ClonesWorklist</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3639"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        NodeCloneCount++</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3640"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        If Func has been cloned less than NodeCloneCount times:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3641"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           If NodeCloneCount is 1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3642"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//             Assign Clone to original Func</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3643"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//             Continue</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3644"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           Create a new function clone</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3645"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           If other callers not assigned to call a function clone yet:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3646"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//              Assign them to call new function clone</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3647"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//              Continue</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3648"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           Assign any other caller calling the cloned version to new clone</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3649"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3650"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        For each caller of Clone:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3651"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           If caller is assigned to call a specific function clone:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3652"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//             If we cannot assign Clone to that function clone:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3653"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//               Create new callsite Clone NewClone</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3654"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//               Add NewClone to ClonesWorklist</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3655"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//               Continue</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3656"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//             Assign Clone to existing caller&#39;s called function clone</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3657"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           Else:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3658"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//             If Clone not already assigned to a function clone:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3659"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                Assign to first function clone without assignment</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3660"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//             Assign caller to selected function clone</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3661"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DerivedCCG, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FuncTy, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CallTy&gt;</span></CodeLine>
